summary: Show document python within gvim command line~
name: python_showpydoc
install_details:
make sure "filetype plugin on" 
the rarfile have 4 scripts: 
python_showpydoc_2.vim is used for python2.x 
and python_showpydoc_3.vim for python3 
the python_showpydoc.vim and ShowPyDoc_PSD117.py for python2.x and python3
copy the scripts you want to ftplugin
